mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users (user_id, email, kakao_id, nickname, user_name, password, profile_image, address, agree_condition, created_at) VALUES (#{userId}, #{email}, #{kakaoId}, #{nickname}, #{userName}, #{password}, #{profileImage}, #{address}, #{agreeCondition}, #{createdAt})

INSERT INTO kakao_users (user_id, kakao_id, nickname, user_name, profile_image, address, agree_condition, created_at) VALUES (#{userId}, #{kakaoId}, #{nickname}, #{userName}, #{profileImage}, #{address}, #{agreeCondition}, #{createdAt})
